00034 $symon['cache_keepstale']=1;
00035 
00036 require_once("setup.inc");
00037 require_once("class_cache.inc");
00038 require_once("class_rrdtool.inc");
00039 require_once("tools.inc");
00040 
00041 function output_picture($filename) {
00042     global $symon;
00043 
00044     $wait = $symon['graph_max_wait'];
00045 
00046     while (!is_readable($filename) && $wait > 0) {
00047     exec('/bin/sleep .1');
00048     $wait -=1;
00049     }
00050 
00051     if (!is_readable($filename)) {
00052     runtime_error("cannot read graph file");
00053     }
00054 
00055     header("content-type: image/gif");
00056     readfile($filename);
00057 }
00058 
00059 /* get request */
00060 if ($_REQUEST) {
00061     list($k) = array_keys($_REQUEST);
00062     if (preg_match("/^([0-9a-f]+)/", $k, $match)) {
00063     $key = $match[1];
00064     $filename = $cache->getfilename($key);
00065     $extension = get_extension($filename);
00066     if ($extension == 'txt') {
00067         $definition = load($filename);
00068         $cache->expire_key($key);
00069         $rrdtool = new RRDTool();
00070         $graph_file = $cache->obtain_filecache($key);
00071         $result = $rrdtool->graph($graph_file, $definition);
00072     } else {
00073         $graph_file = $filename;
00074         $result = 1;
00075     }
00076 
00077     if ($result == 1) {
00078         output_picture($graph_file);
00079     }
00080     }
00081 }
